MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G72 postcode area of Cambuslang, affecting properties in Calder Grover and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 6:15PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:02PM on 08 April 2021.
